attributes.description:
FREE TWO YEAR UNLIMITED KM,S MECHANICAL WARRANTY INCLUDED!!! THIS MONTH ONLY !!!
(Terms and Conditions below)
Ford Ranger 2.2 Tdci 6 Speed  SUP/Cab with only 82000Km, Last service done at 81000Km.  
Extras include: Tow bar, Air-conditioning, rubberized Load Bin and T-cover.
This Ranger was superbly maintained with a very neat Grey cloth  interior. 2016 Model.
Great value for money with excellent build quality and proven Ford reliability and superb fuel consumption.
Come in today and test drive this car.
Don’t delay its priced to sell. 
Fuel consumption 10.9 km/L or 9.1L /100km or on highway use.
Tank capacity 80L and service interval’s 20000km. 
FINANCE  AVAILABLE  WITH  ALL THE  MAJOR  BANKS.
Same day APPROVAL and DELIVERY, call us to get pre-approved. 
TRADE INS WELCOME.              
We can bring the vehicle to you if you are a serious buyer.
Please view our website below http://www.alpineautohaus.co.za
021-5100479  or  021-5100781.
SEAN   HESS   -0723877157 (English or Afrikaans)
DANIEL VAN NEEL -0840344808 (All hours, 24/7)
MICHAEL REYNOLDS - 0725305282
ADDRESS.  441 Koeberg Road Rugby Cape Town.

22048320
